about_the_game:
"Mutant Crisis - Tower Defense" is an extension of the tower defense mode of "Mutant Crisis". Players will experience the fun of unique combat methods and strategic layout. In the game, players need to use defense towers and traps to block the enemy's attack, and directly fight against mutant monsters through first-person shooting to protect the base from enemy destruction.

Game features:

  • Dual perspective fusion: The game supports switching between first-person and third-person perspectives. Players can plan the layout of defense towers or operate characters to shoot by themselves, and flexibly respond to various challenges.

  • Mainly mutant monsters: The enemies in the game are mainly mutant monsters. These monsters have unique appearances, behavior patterns and attack methods, which increase the diversity and strategy of the battle.

  • Rich customization system: Players can freely choose weapons, skills and defense towers, and improve their combat and defense capabilities by upgrading equipment and unlocking new props. This customization system allows players to adjust according to their preferences and tactical needs.

  • Exciting combat experience: The game uses realistic style graphics, exquisite scene design, and realistic sound effects to bring players an immersive combat experience. At the same time, as the level progresses, the number and strength of enemies will gradually increase, bringing higher challenges.

  • Equal emphasis on strategy and operation: Players must not only reasonably plan the location of defense towers, but also use weapons and skills flexibly in battle to engage in fierce confrontation with the enemy. This combination of strategy and operation makes the game more in-depth and interesting.

Gameplay:

  • Defense phase: Players need to place defense towers and traps on the map and block the enemy's attack by rationally planning the path. Defense towers can be upgraded and matched with different types of traps to form a strong defense line.

  • Shooting phase: When the enemy breaks through the defense line, players need to hold weapons and directly fight against the enemy. The game provides a variety of weapons and skills for players to choose from, including pistols, machine guns, rocket launchers, etc. Each weapon has a unique attack method and effect.

  • Mission challenge: The game has multiple levels and tasks, each with different goals and requirements. Players need to complete the task within the time limit, while protecting the core facilities as much as possible or eliminating all enemies.

    New Map:

  • Ruined Temple

    New Mode:

  • Tower Defense Mode

    Added Traps and Turrets:

  • Wall Laser: Causes Area Damage, Attacks Ground Units

  • Machine Gun Tower: Single Point Damage, Attacks Ground and Air

  • Energy Turret: Single Point Damage, Attacks Ground Units

  • Defense Hero Trap: Melee Area Damage, Attacks Ground Units

  • Healing Hero Trap: Single Healing Type, Healing Ground Trap Type

  • Mage Hero Trap: Long-range Group Attack Type, Attacks Ground Units

  • Shooter Hero Trap: Single Point Damage, Attacks Ground and Air
